tldr: Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to cross-site scripting (XSS) due to insufficient sanitization of the `caption` field, allowing attackers to inject and execute malicious scripts in a userâ€™s browser.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version that falls within the vulnerable range.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `react-photoswipe-gallery` library to the patch version.
